hero.title: Sell Online Across India on ArcNxt at
hero.subtitle: Reach customers nationwide with 0% commission and simple onboarding
hero.note: Selected seller categories may onboard without a regular GST

why.title: Why Sellers Love ArcNxt
why.subtitle: Everything is designed to help you sell more and grow your business

items.title: 0% Commission Fee
items.desc: Sell on ArcNxt without paying any commission and keep 100% of your earnings.

items.title: 0 Penalty Charges
items.desc: No penalties for late dispatch or order cancellations. Sell without fear.

items.title: Growth for Every Seller
items.desc: From small sellers to large brands, ArcNxt supports growth for all‚Äîincluding select non-GST sellers.

rewards.title: Exclusive Seller Rewards for Your First 30 Days
rewards.subtitle: Designed to help new sellers start strong and grow faster on ArcNxt

items.title: Free Product Visibility
items.desc: Get boosted visibility for your products during your first 30 days to attract more buyers.

items.title: Free Product Listing
items.desc: List unlimited products on ArcNxt at no cost and start selling immediately.

items.title: No Return Charges on First 10 Orders
items.desc: Enjoy zero return charges for your first 10 orders, reducing your initial risk.

items.title: No Order Cancellation Charges
items.desc: Cancel orders you cannot fulfil without worrying about penalties.

items.title: Lowest Return Charges
items.desc: ArcNxt offers one of the lowest return charges across all marketplaces.

steps.title: Create Account
steps.desc: GSTIN (for GST sellers) or Enrolment ID / UIN (for non-GST sellers) and a valid bank account.

steps.title: List Products
steps.desc: List the products you want to sell from your seller panel.

steps.title: Get Orders
steps.desc: Start receiving orders from customers shopping across India.

steps.title: Affordable Shipping
steps.desc: Ship products nationwide using affordable and reliable logistics.

steps.title: Receive Payments
steps.desc: Payments are deposited directly into your bank account after a 7-day settlement cycle.

learningZone.title: ArcNxt Learning Zone
learningZone.desc: Learn how to sell, scale, and grow your business on ArcNxt with step-by-step guides, video tutorials, and seller best practices.

items.title: Affordable Nationwide Shipping
items.desc: Deliver products to customers across India at competitive rates.

items.title: Fast Dispatch Programs
items.desc: Eligible sellers can access faster shipping options.

items.title: Promotional Tools
items.desc: Increase visibility using platform promotion tools.

items.title: Business Insights
items.desc: Track performance and make data-driven decisions.

support.title: ArcNxt Seller Support
support.subtitle: Available 24/7
support.desc: Our Seller Support team is available round the clock to help you before and after onboarding, ensuring a smooth selling experience on ARCNXT.
